properties.areaDesc: Jersey, IL; Lincoln, MO; St. Charles, MO; Greene, IL; Calhoun, IL; Pike, MO; Pike, IL
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 7:09PM CST until January 10 at 8:00PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Calhoun County in southwestern Illinois...
Greene County in southwestern Illinois...
Southeastern Pike County in west central Illinois...
Jersey County in southwestern Illinois...
Northwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri...
Eastern Lincoln County in east central Missouri...
Southeastern Pike County in northeastern Missouri...

* Until 800 PM CST.

* At 709 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Elsberry to 6 miles southwest of Hardin to near
Chain of Rocks, moving northeast at 80 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
O'Fallon, St. Charles, St. Peters, Wentzville, Lake St. Louis,
Dardenne Prairie, Jerseyville, White Hall, Elsberry, St. Paul,
Carrollton, Brighton, Roodhouse, Winfield, Greenfield, Hardin,
Grafton, Elsah, New Melle and Josephville.

This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 210 and 222.

This also includes Pere Marquette State Park.
properties.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly
from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the
basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
